message.content:
I need to identify the total income arising from ordinary activities and its constituent line items from the income statement.

From the problem statement, I can see that "Total Revenue" represents the total income from ordinary activities with a value of 2637011.03.

Looking at the constituent line items, I can see that "Main Business Revenue" is the only component of "Total Revenue" with the same value of 2637011.03.

Therefore:
- The total income is "Total Revenue" with a value of 2637011.03
- The sub-item is "Main Business Revenue" with a value of 2637011.03

```json
{"solution": {'value': '2637011.03', 'sub_items': {'sub_item value': '2637011.03'}}}
```
